tool_description: Retrieves basic property records from public databases using various property identifiers such as address, parcel number, or APN.

property_address.description: Full property address including street, city, state, and ZIP code

error_messages: No identifier provided: At least one of property_address, parcel_number, or apn must be provided.
Property not found: No records found for the provided identifier(s). Verify the accuracy of the input data.
Multiple properties found: The provided identifier matches multiple properties. Use a more specific identifier such as parcel_number or apn.
Database unavailable: Public records database is temporarily unavailable. Retry after some time.
usage: Provide at least one property identifier (address, parcel number, or APN) to retrieve basic property information from public records databases.

property_id.description: Unique property identifier from the database

building_area.description: Total building area in square feet
